metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9772 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: OpenAFS 1.6.19 and earlier allows remote attackers to obtain sensitivedirectory information via vectors involving the (1) client cache partition,(2) fileserver vice partition, or (3) certain RPC responses.

criterions.comment: openafs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
